cmd='/usr/bin/cmake;-DUPNPC_BUILD_STATIC=ON;-DUPNPC_BUILD_SHARED=OFF;-DUPNPC_BUILD_TESTS=OFF;-Wno-dev;-DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE:PATH=;-DCMAKE_USER_MAKE_RULES_OVERRIDE=;-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS:STRING=;-DCMAKE_CXX_FLAGS:STRING=;-DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE:STRING=;-DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX:PATH=<INSTALL_DIR>;-GUnix Makefiles;<SOURCE_DIR><SOURCE_SUBDIR>'
